snippet.title: Sector Zero Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it here:
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/348580/Sector_Zero/
iOS Free version: http://bit.ly/1lnMmoi 
Android Free version (Amazon Appstore): http://amzn.to/Z2lJLu 
Android Free version (Google Play): http://bit.ly/1n9xEgd
iOS Paid version: http://bit.ly/1gDGlgE 


http://vintsevych.com

Sector Zero is a story-driven Sci-Fi survival game with light RPG elements.
Planned for release on: iPhone, iPad, Android, Mac and Windows 8.

Music by www.lukhash.com
